Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, between the City Walls and the Pub.
Room.LongDescription: The large Red-Eye Pub and Grill is a very popular hang out for travelers to tell stories and tall tales about their various adventures outside of the town. The Pub and Grill also extends to a patio outside where a stage has been set up for bards and minstrels to perform and really annoy the public.
